name: Titanium.Android.QuickSettingsService
summary: Android service for creating custom quick settings tiles and handling user's interaction with them.

events.name: startlistening
events.description: Dispatched whenever the user has opened the quick setting menu and the Tile is added in there.

events.name: stoplistening
events.description: Dispatched whenever the user has collapsed the quick setting menu and the Tile is not visible.

events.name: tileadded
events.summary: The Tile has been added in the quick menu.
events.description: Dispatched wheneved the user has moved the Tile for this service in the quick settings menu.

events.name: tileremoved
events.summary: The Tile has been removed from the quick menu.
events.description: Dispatched wheneved the user has removed the Tile for this service from the quick settings menu.

events.name: tiledialogoptionselected
events.summary: An item from the signle choice menu has been selected.

properties.name: itemIndex
properties.summary: Index of the selected item from the single choice menu in the dialog.

properties.name: bubbles
properties.summary: True if the event will try to bubble up if possible.

properties.name: cancelBubble
properties.summary: Set to true to stop the event from bubbling.

events.name: tiledialogcancelled
events.summary: Dispatched when the alert dialog has been cancelled.

events.name: tiledialogpositive
events.summary: Dispatched when the positive (index 0) button has been clicked.

events.name: tiledialogneutral
events.summary: Dispatched when the neutral (index 1) button has been clicked.

events.name: tiledialognegative
events.summary: Dispatched when the negative (index 2) button has been clicked.

deprecated.notes: Please use the icon property to get/set the value.
Please use the label property to get/set the value.
Please use the state property to get/set the value.

methods.name: isLocked
methods.summary: Returns 'true' if the device is currently locked, 'false' otherwise.

methods.name: isSecure
methods.summary: Returns 'true' if the device is in secure state, 'false' otherwise.

methods.name: setIcon

deprecated.notes: Please use the icon property to get/set the value.

methods.description: If no image is passed as Tile icon it will use the Application's one.

methods.name: setLabel

deprecated.notes: Please use the label property to get/set the value.

methods.description: If no label is set the Tile uses the Application name.

methods.name: setState

deprecated.notes: Please use the state property to get/set the value.

methods.description: State can be one of the following: TILE_STATE_UNAVAILABLE, TILE_STATE_INACTIVE, TILE_STATE_ACTIVE

methods.name: showDialog
methods.description:
Creates and shows a default Alert dialog with the provided options dictionary.

Note: Alert dialog only supports one of the following: message/options. If you pass both - only message will be shown.

parameters.name: options
parameters.summary: Dictionary containing the options for the dialog.

methods.name: startActivityAndCollapse
methods.summary: Colapses the quick settings menu and starts an activity for the passed Intent.

methods.name: unlockAndRun
methods.summary: Prompts the user to unlock the device and runs the JS code.

methods.name: updateTile
methods.description: Updates the Tile's with it's current label, icon and state.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: If no image is passed as Tile icon it will use the Application's one.

properties.name: label
properties.description: If no label is set the Tile uses the Application name.

properties.name: state
properties.description: State can be one of the following: TILE_STATE_UNAVAILABLE, TILE_STATE_INACTIVE, TILE_STATE_ACTIVE
